content: Ok, I did the environmental variables. Yes, but let's make sure we are doing this in a way that minimizes my manual effort, not just now, but going forward. We've learned a lot in here that we'll need to do a post-mortem on, but if we need to build out some things that won't get stripped down and rebuilt, like stuff we're going to need to test efficiently, then let's do that. I don't know if that made sense or not, but yes, let's go with what you say is next. We have a bunch of collections set up in the Firestore db from previous builds and efforts. I'm sure it is all completely irrelevant now. API keys were stored there, but I think you came up with something else for that.
